It is in connection with the last mentioned that I wish to say a word or two. In 1914, there sailed from Australia what was known as the 3rd Battalion, Naval and Military Expeditionary Eorce, under General Pethebridge. These men were enlisted for service, and were sent to take charge of the Marshalls, the Carolines, the Ladrones, and other islands. As honourable members are aware, however, when this Porce reached the islands they found that the Japanese had preceded them by five days, and were in possession.
